entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools hangs #31228
    Discussion
  • Emit a warning when EmbeddedResourceUseDependentUponConvention is true and first type in a file doesn't match file name. #31219
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc][VS64] With .NET 8 preview 3 SDK installed on German OS, warning description is unlocalized when running "dotnet publish -r win10-x64" in CLI. #31213
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project is blocked by"Emscripten Deadlocked" warning. #31209

Closed

  • Updated Visual Studio 2022 to 17.5.2 and can pair with Mac #31207

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31226
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31214
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #31189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31202
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #31192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31191
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Don't add AOT package in restore for < net7 #31201
    Area-NativeAOT
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-Infrastructure
